description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Caitie McCaffrey - Distributed Systems Diva at Twitter

ABSTRACT
Distributed Systems are difficult to build and test for two main reasons: partial failure & asynchrony.  These two realities of distributed systems must be addressed to create a correct system, and often times the resulting systems have a high degree of [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/The%20Verification%20of%20a%20Distributed%20System

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
